Editable headings can only have trailing.wt2wt:
====test====
yup

====hi ho====
<noinclude>
nope
</noinclude>

====test 2====
another yup

<!-- well -->====ha ha====
back to nope

====he he====  <!-- but this is ok -->
see

 h3 index:T-1 toclevel:1 number:2 title:Template:With_heading_nesting off:NULL anchor/linkAnchor:in_4 line:in 4

 h3 index:T-3 toclevel:1 number:4 title:Template:With_heading_nesting off:NULL anchor/linkAnchor:in_3 line:in 3
